pageSubtitle: Select a case study below to see how our AI handles different industries and use cases.
footnote: Note: This interaction is handled 100% by Lead Awaker AI. No human intervention required until intent is confirmed.

solarPanel.title: Solar Panel
solarPanel.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Solar Panel Installation</colored>
solarPanel.description: This flow demonstrates how Lead Awaker reactivates quote-history leads and turns "maybe later" into a concrete next step. The AI starts with a low-friction identity check, then immediately guides the conversation into directed discovery (no easy opt-out). It quantifies the current pain, surfaces the technical constraint (north-facing roof), then positions the call as the fastest way to get a realistic payback range and design options.
metrics: 12.5% Appointment rate from cold quote history
Zero manual intervention until the specialist call
solarPanel.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: Photo collection of roof and meter, subsidy eligibility checks, automated pre-survey questionnaires, reminders to reduce no-show calls, and post-call follow-ups with personalized next steps.
solarPanel.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Calm technical consultant. Direct, enthusiastic, and keeps momentum toward a booked assessment.

messages.content: Hi James, Michael from Aviax Solar here. Quick check, is this the James who asked us for a solar estimate a while ago? ðŸ™‚

Thanks James. My manager asked me to follow up, but I didn't want to spam you.

Are you still aiming to reduce your monthly electricity cost this year?

Perfect.

Roughly what are you paying per month right now, and has it increased over the last year?

That adds up fast.

If rates keep creeping up, what happens to your costs over the next 2 to 3 years if nothing changes?

Exactly.

One technical detail decides whether solar works in your case. Is your main roof section north-facing, south-facing, or mixed?
so I doubt it pays back

Totally fair.

Most people assume north-facing means "no," but pitch, shading, usable roof area, and whether we can use east or west sections can change the math.

What we're really good at is personalizationâ€”matching panel layout and assumptions to your exact roof and usage so the payback estimate is realistic.

If we could confirm in 10 minutes whether you can hit a payback you feel good about, would that be worth it?
can you reassure it pays back in less than 10 years?

Good question.

I can't responsibly promise a number in chat without modeling your roof and tariff, but our specialist can give you a realistic range and tell you whether under 10 years is achievable for your setup.

Do you have 10 minutes on a call to run through your roof and usage quickly?
I see, it does make sense

Perfect James, you're booked for Monday at 11:00 âœ…

Our specialist will call you then to go through payback and your north-facing roof.
You are welcome and have a good day ðŸ™‚

gym.title: Gym Membership
gym.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Gym Membership</colored>
gym.description: This reactivation flow is built like a real sales conversation, not a generic "come back" text. The AI starts with a low-friction identity check, uses a natural excuse to re-open the conversation, then runs SPIN-style discovery to diagnose churn and build a plan. It handles a second lifestyle objection (new baby), then converts intent into a personal trainer plan appointment.
gym.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: Automated "missed workout" follow-ups, cancellation save sequences, reactivation offers triggered by time away, PT lead nurturing, and membership renewal reminders.
gym.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Motivational coach. High empathy, high energy, and keeps momentum toward a next step.

messages.content: Hi Mark, it's Sara from IronPulse Fitness Club here. Is this the same Mark who used to be a member with us a while back? ðŸ™‚

Nice. My calendar pinged me to follow up, but I didn't want to spam you.

Are you still looking to get back into training?

Totally fair.

When you were training with us, what was the main goal you cared about most? Strength, fat loss, or just consistency?

Got it.

What made you stop coming in last time? Was it time, motivation, or you weren't seeing progress fast enough?
I couldnt tell if I was improving

That's the worst, because then it feels like effort with no reward.

If you had clear proof each month that you're improving, would it be easier to stick with it?
yes, it is sort of a pattern with me, I start motivated but then it fizzles out

I hear you Mark.

We do a monthly check-in so you can see progress clearly, and we adjust the plan fast.

Before I suggest the best next step, what is the biggest constraint right now: time, energy, or motivation?
we just had a baby so its unpredictable

Congrats on your baby! ðŸŽ‰

That's exactly when a simple plan helps most.

Let's book a quick personal trainer plan appointment so you and the PT can map out a realistic routine. Sound good?

Awesome, you're booked for Monday 4pm âœ…

Your personal trainer will call you then to build a plan that fits your schedule.

If anything changes, reply here and we'll reschedule.
You are welcome, have a good day ðŸ™‚

restaurant.title: Restaurant Booking
restaurant.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Restaurant Booking</colored>
restaurant.description: This flow shows "reactivation + conversion" in a fast-moving niche. The AI restarts an abandoned inquiry, captures the key booking details, confirms special requests, and then handles rescheduling instantly when plans change. It keeps the guest experience friendly while protecting staff time and reducing missed reservations.
metrics: 100% Automated handling of re-scheduling and special requests
restaurant.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: Dietary preference capture, deposit links for peak nights, no-show reduction sequences, waitlist automation, post-visit review requests, and "VIP guest" tagging.
restaurant.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Warm host. Polite, fast, detail-oriented, and service-first.

messages.content:
Hi Steve, Jennifer from Dragon Wok Kitchen here.

You emailed us recently about booking a table. Are you still looking to reserve?
it was about 2 weeks ago I think
Nice, is this for a special occasion, or a normal dinner?
thought your venue could be nice

That's lovely ðŸ™‚

What day were you thinking, and how many people?

Perfect.

We can do a small birthday touch, like dessert with a candle. Would you like that?

Done.

Here's the booking link to choose your time: https://calendar.app.google/uvWx5JWm7SLZSCqz7

Great, you're confirmed.

Anything else you want us to know, like allergies or a quieter table?
I remember that I have to pick up my kid at that time. can I book another time?

Of course, no problem.

What time on Thursday works better?

Perfect, I moved it to 5:00 PM.

If anything changes again, just message me here.
My pleasure, Steve. See you soon!

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Real Estate</colored>
realEstate.description: Real estate leads often stall because the buyer can't tell what is "normal" pricing and what is a bad deal. This AI flow restarts the conversation with a low-friction identity check, uses a natural excuse to re-open the thread, then qualifies the buyer's timeline, criteria, and budget. It shares matching listings immediately, and escalates to a real agent once the buyer is comparing options.
metrics: Automated appraisal bookings synced with agent apps
realEstate.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: Automated tour scheduling, automated contract and document sharing, listing alerts when new matches appear, price-drop notifications, and follow-ups that adapt to timeline changes.
realEstate.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Patient market guide. Calm, direct, and focused on moving the buyer from browsing to a decision.

messages.content: Hi Liam, Mia from HomeHaven Realty here. Quick check: are you the Liam who inquired a while back about beach-area properties? ðŸ™‚
Just circling back because I didn't want your request to fall through the cracks. Are you still looking to buy in the beach area?

Got it.

To narrow this fast, are you looking to buy within 6 months, or is the timeline flexible?

Great.

What are your top 3 must-haves? For example: distance to beach, bedrooms, and security.

Perfect.

What budget are you aiming for so we don't waste time on listings that won't fit?
but I dont want to overpay

Makes sense.

Here's a shortlist of current listings that match your criteria so you can see real options:
https://homehaven.example/listings?near=beach&beds=2&security=high&max=200000
im unsure between Marina View and Sandgate Residences

That's a good place to be.

To avoid a costly mistake, the next step is a short call with our real agent to compare fees, recent sales nearby, and negotiation room.

Want to book that comparison call now?

Great Liam, you're booked for Wednesday at 16:00 âœ…

Your agent will be John Mayer. He's friendly and very strong on beach-area pricing, negotiation, and spotting hidden costs like HOA fees.

healthClinic.title: Health Clinic
healthClinic.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Health Clinic</colored>
healthClinic.description: In healthcare, leads drop because it feels overwhelming and personal. This AI flow reactivates the lead gently, collects just enough context to route them correctly, answers a final question about services, and locks the consult. It sets expectations that the specialist will assess nutrition first and also check whether other integrative care is needed.
metrics: 31% Appointment rate for chronic symptom leads
healthClinic.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: Intake forms, reminder sequences, pre-visit instructions, post-visit follow-ups, care-plan check-ins, and routing urgent symptoms to faster care pathways.
healthClinic.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Calm clinical coordinator. Warm, minimal, and focused on getting the patient to the right professional.

messages.content:
Hi Daniel, Marcia from Holistica Balance Center here ðŸ™‚

I'm glad to reconnect. Are you still looking for support with the consultation you asked about?

Thanks.

What is the main issue you want help with right now?

That sounds really uncomfortable.

How long has it been going on, and any trouble swallowing or vomiting?

Ok.

Have you noticed food triggers, and have you tried anything that helped?
avoiding helps but it still happens

Got it.

Would you like to book an in-person consult so our specialist Nutritionist can review your case and set a plan? They will also assess if you need other integrative care.
Just checking in Daniel, do you want me to send the booking link?

All set Daniel, you're booked for Monday at 16:00 âœ…

Quick question before you go: do you offer food intolerance tests, or is it only nutrition guidance?
yeah thats what I wanted to ask

Yes, we do offer testing options.

Your Nutritionist will explain what makes sense for your symptoms and whether it is better to test before or after the first consult.
You are welcome and have a good day ðŸ™‚

lawFirm.title: Law Firm
lawFirm.heading: Case {{caseNumber}} - <colored>Law Firm</colored>
lawFirm.description: Our Lead Awaker AI reactivates cold leads for car finance refunds and quickly moves them into the only step that matters: getting the agreement documents. It qualifies eligibility, handles the "I don't have the paperwork" blocker, then guides the lead through a DSAR (Data Subject Access Request) so your team only touches cases that are ready.
lawFirm.descriptionExtra: What happens next: The DSAR compels car finance companies to send the agreement documents. A law firm clerk reviews them for mis-sold commission hidden in payments, and if found, the client can claim a refund (often Â£1,000-Â£3,000).
metrics: Cost per DSAR: $21 (fully automated, no calls, no salespeople)
lawFirm.additionalUseCases: Additional use cases for this niche: DSAR completion reminders, "30 working day" status updates, auto-escalation to a clerk when documents arrive, and reactivation campaigns for leads that started but did not finish.
lawFirm.agentProfile: Agent Speech Profile: Compliance-first admin. Clear, process-led, and low-pressure.

messages.content: Hi, this is Sophie from Sterling Finance. Is this Oliver who wanted to check whether they were owed a refund on their car finance?
Just bumping this up in case you got busy before :)
I would like to check. I had 2 cars on finance 5 years ago
That's great, Oliver. Do you happen to have your vehicle finance agreement documents handy for those cars?

No worries at all. We can submit a Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) on your behalf to retrieve those documents.

Could you please complete this short DSAR form by clicking this URL? https://www.dsarform.com/lead315
What is the process from here?
Do you let me know if I'm eligible once you retrieve the docs and then I confirm I want to proceed?

Absolutely.

Once you complete the DSAR form, we request your agreement and review it. If we find you are eligible for a claim, we will get in touch to discuss next steps.

It typically takes around 30 working days to receive and review the documents. We operate on a no-win, no-fee basis, so there is no risk to you.

Form link: https://www.dsarform.com/lead315
Thanks for completing the form. You will hear from us soon. If you have any questions, feel free to ask ðŸ™‚
No, that is all from me
Ok Oliver, have a great day :)
